title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.5 - Hospital and related medical care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.5 - Hospital and related medical care

State Regulations

Reimbursement for inpatient and outpatient care rendered by hospitals and other facilities established pursuant to article 28 shall be made at rates not to exceed those established for patients eligible for medical assistance (Medicaid). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
45.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
